name: Clostridioides difficile
input: Gram-positive rods. Catalase negative. Oxidase negative. Colony morphology grey-white; irregular; ground-glass. Colony pattern ground-glass. Pigment none. Odor barnyard; horse-manure. Haemolysis negative, haemolysis type none. Indole negative. Growth temperature 20//42. Media grown on Anaerobic Blood Agar; CCFA Agar. Motility positive. Motility type peritrichous. Capsule variable. Spore formation positive. Oxygen requirement anaerobic. Methyl Red positive. VP negative. Citrate negative. Urease negative. H2S variable. Lactose fermentation negative. Glucose fermentation positive. Sucrose fermentation positive. Nitrate reduction negative. Lysine decarboxylase negative. Ornithine decarboxylase negative. Arginine dihydrolase negative. Gelatin hydrolysis positive. Esculin hydrolysis variable. DNase negative. ONPG negative. NaCl tolerant (>=6%) negative. Lipase test negative. Xylose fermentation positive. Rhamnose fermentation negative. Mannitol fermentation positive. Sorbitol fermentation positive. Maltose fermentation positive. Arabinose fermentation negative. Raffinose fermentation negative. Inositol fermentation negative. Trehalose fermentation positive. TSI pattern A/A. Gas production positive. Coagulase negative.

expected.Media Grown On: Anaerobic Blood Agar; CCFA Agar
